1.0.1: Improvement: Updated star selection behavior on the My Characters page.
1.1.0: Feature: Introduced 'Allow Overlap' option to allow or prevent characters from being assigned to multiple teams within the same destination in Step 3 of the recommendation process.
1.2.0: Feature: Introduced 'Braindead Mode' to automatically generate the two strongest non-overlapping teams for each destination in Step 3 of the recommendation process.
1.3.0: Feature: Added a modal to display the current version and changelog.
Improvement: Reversed the order of the Rank dropdown on the My Characters page.
